data.event: Fontana's history as a community dates back to the early 19th century, however incorporation did not occur until 1889.
Captain David Martin, a veteran of the War of 1812 received a land grant for 160 acres (0.65 km2) in Lykins County, Kansas (Miami County, Kansas) due to an 1855 congressional act.

event.title: purchased 120 acres (0.49 km2) of the property in 1869

data.event: J.B. Grinnell purchased 120 acres (0.49 km2) of the property in 1869, and put Fontana in the center near a railroad right of way.
